testcase.name: try to login to github

failure.message: web2.feature:6 - driver config / start failed: org.apache.http.conn.HttpHostConnectException: Connect to localhost:9222 [localhost/127.0.0.1, localhost/0:0:0:0:0:0:0:1] failed: Connection refused: connect, options: {type=chrome, showDriverLog=true, start=false, beforeStart=supervisorctl start ffmpeg, afterStop=supervisorctl stop ffmpeg, videoFile=/tmp/karate.mp4, target=null}
